name: Arresting Wrestling Demo!
description:
Arresting Wrestling, the demo. Think wrestling as a sleuth to determine the killer.

Plot will unfold later, this is just a sample to initiate yourself with the Arresting Wrestling world. For web (html5) and Gameboy! Please get in touch athletes to be featured...as...the killer?!?! :) Z key to close text, arrow keys to move.. Enjoy!!!

BoogiemanFan (@arrestingwrestling) • Instagram photos and videos https://www.instagram.com/arrestingwrestling/
